Reading source file and converting it into a dataframe

def get_entra_id_data(file_path: str) -> DataFrame:
    """
    Reads EntraID json files into a DataFrame

    Returns:
        Spark DataFrame
    """
    json_file_df: DataFrame = spark.read.option("multiline", "true").json(file_path)
    dfs: list = [] # an empty list to store the data frames
    for row in json_file_df.select('value').collect():
        for data in row['value']:
            dfs.append(data)
    print("Found " +str(len(dfs))+" records")
    df = spark.createDataFrame(dfs)
    
    #store the ingestion date
    df = df.withColumn('IngestionDate', F.current_timestamp())

    display(df)
    return df
